campaignPerformance.name: CTM - O.F - BOFU - Kitchen Remodeling
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

campaignPerformance.name: LocalServicesCampaign:SystemGenerated:0005eb544d960f70
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

keyInsights.insight: 2 campaign(s) losing ~$4,858/month: CTM - O.F - BOFU - Kitchen Remodeling (0.12x ROAS on $4,841), LocalServicesCampaign:SystemGenerated:0005eb544d960f70 (0.03x ROAS on $616).
$1,604 spent on 61 zero-conversion search terms (100% of visible spend).
2 low-QS keywords costing ~$561/month in CPC premiums.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 15 conversion actions (2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 4x CONTACT, 2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 3x PAGE_VIEW, 1x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x REQUEST_QUOTE, 2x DEFAULT). Recording 25 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Enhanced conversions or offline import detected — recovers 5-15% of conversions lost to cookie restrictions.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: Server-side or offline conversion import active — bypasses ad blockers and browser restrictions.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 7 conversion categories: 2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 4x CONTACT, 2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 3x PAGE_VIEW, 1x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x REQUEST_QUOTE, 2x DEFAULT.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 7x "call" actions; 4x "form" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 15 actions recording 25 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $1,604 spent on 61 zero-conversion search terms (100% of $1,604 visible search spend). Top waste: "cabinet door shop near me" $116, "home addition contractors near me" $94, "brookwood cabinet company" $73, "kitchen remodels on a budget" $73, "contractor for remodeling house" $73.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 2 list(s) with 336 total negatives. Add themed lists (Competitors, Job Seekers, Irrelevant) — minimum 3 for proper filtering.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 336 negative keywords across 2 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $4,841 spend, 9 conv, $538 CPA. Exact: $0 spend, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 1 keywords spent $479 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "kitchen remodeling contractors" $479.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 2 naming prefix(es) across 4 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 5 ad groups across 4 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 4 campaigns: 1 LOCAL_SERVICES, 3 SEARCH.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 4 campaigns, $341/day budget, 58% Search Impression Share. Worst: LocalServicesCampaign:SystemGenerated:0005eb544d960f70 (0.03x ROAS, $616). $5,457/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $341/day budget, ~$182/day actual spend (53% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Settings > Locations.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 4.0/10 across 2 scored keywords (0 at 7+, 1 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$561/month. Top offenders: "kitchen remodel lansing mi" QS 3 ($1,753 spend, ~$561 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 645 of 1402 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 4.0 indicates poor keyword-to-ad relevance. Tighten ad group themes and include keywords in headlines.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 12 RSAs: 1 Good/Excellent, 11 need improvement (9 POOR, 2 AVERAGE, 1 GOOD).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 8.46%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS, TARGET_CPA.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 58% Search Impression Share — moderate coverage, room to grow.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 81 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 13 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 3 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 447 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 2 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 10 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

quickWins.action: Pause or restructure "CTM - O.F - BOFU - Kitchen Remodeling" — 0.12x ROAS on $4,841, losing ~$4,260/month.
Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "cabinet door shop near me", "home addition contractors near me", "brookwood cabinet company"... — $1,604 wasted.
Pause or restructure "LocalServicesCampaign:SystemGenerated:0005eb544d960f70" — 0.03x ROAS on $616, losing ~$598/month.
Improve 2 keywords with QS below 5 — est. $561/month CPC premium. Worst: "kitchen remodel lansing mi" QS 3.
Pause 1 zero-conversion keywords: "kitchen remodeling contractors" — $479 wasted.
Fix: No duplicate counting — Potential duplicates: 7x "call" actions; 4x "form" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

items: 2 campaign(s) are losing money ($4,858/month): CTM - O.F - BOFU - Kitchen Remodeling (0.12x ROAS, $4,841), LocalServicesCampaign:SystemGenerated:0005eb544d960f70 (0.03x ROAS, $616). Restructure keywords/targeting or reduce budget.

$1,604 wasted on 61 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "cabinet door shop near me", "home addition contractors near me", "brookwood cabinet company", "kitchen remodels on a budget", "contractor for remodeling house".
2 keywords with QS below 5 are costing ~$561 extra/month in CPC premiums. Improve ad relevance and landing page alignment for these keywords.
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Build remarketing audiences (all visitors 30d, cart abandoners, converters) and upload Customer Match lists from CRM.
Pause or restructure 1 zero-conversion keywords to recover $479/month.
Build conversion volume and data before scaling.
